name: There Can Only Be One (knightrealm)
description:
"There Can Only Be One" is a turn based strategy game made for Amber Wave of Games' "The one and only" game jam.

Choose a god and summon hordes of cultists to battle it out on the summoning fields with the goal of gaining enough souls to bridge the physical world to your god's domain.

This game is entirely player-controlled. AI factions was planned but we ran out of time to do this, but may be added once the jam ends.

Zip contains both Mac and PC builds of the game.

Features:

-Faction Selection

-Map Selection

-Almanac

-Two unit types

Programmer- Adam Draheim

Artist- Grace Lui

Map Design- Brandon Witkin

Game Design- Matthew Witkin

Controls:

WASD to move camera
-Left click your unit to focus it
-Left click on a square then to move there
-Left click on an adjacent unit to attack it
-Right click next to your summoner to summon a unit
-Hit 1 to summon a cultist
-Hit 2 to summon a summoner
